title: ninadharuL vENDinEn
sahitya:
ninadaruL vENDinEn nimalanE!

enaduLLam ANDavanE ayyanE!  

anupallavi  

kanavilum ninaivilum kazhal maRandaRiyEn

tanadenum nilai nInga aruL puri meyyanE!  

caraNam  

shAnta maRaiporuLai uNarttiDum jyOtiyE!

kAnta malaittalattil puRappDum dIpamE!

mAndar kurai kaLaiyum mAmarundE parama

shAnta guNALanE shabari deyvamE
